name: Team 18 - Godai Journey
description:
control (Team 18 - Godai Journey)
Mouse , keyboard

Story (Team 18 - Godai Journey)
We are on the island of Godai where the 5 elemental spirits live: Ku the spirit of emptiness, Hi the spirit of fire, Sui the spirit of water, Fuu the spirit of wind and Chi the spirit of earth. Together they have maintained balance since the dawn of creation on our beautiful planet. But the current industrialisation of our world, the pollution of our oceans, our soils and our skies are disrupting this fragile balance and causing chaos and imbalance in our world. The link thus broken, our 5 spirits have disappeared, imprisoned in all this pollution, plunging the colours of our world into darkness. You will play as Fuku, a young Kitsune messenger and you will help him in his journey.

Credit (Team 18 - Godai Journey)
